nodes.documentation:
@dev Initializer. Can only be called once.
@param _token The address where the ERC20 token contract is deployed
nodes.name: init
apply
deposit
withdraw
exit
challenge
updateStatus
updateStatuses
claimReward
claimRewards
voterReward

nodes.documentation:
@dev                Determines whether the given listingHash be whitelisted.
@param _listingHash The listingHash whose status is to be examined
nodes.name: canBeWhitelisted

nodes.documentation:
@dev                Returns true if the provided listingHash is whitelisted
@param _listingHash The listingHash whose status is to be examined
nodes.name: isWhitelisted

nodes.documentation:
@dev                Returns true if apply was called for this listingHash
@param _listingHash The listingHash whose status is to be examined
nodes.name: appWasMade

nodes.documentation:
@dev                Returns true if the application/listingHash has an unresolved challenge
@param _listingHash The listingHash whose status is to be examined
nodes.name: challengeExists
challengeCanBeResolved

@param _challengeID The challengeID to determine a reward for

whitelistApplication

nodes.documentation:
@dev                Deletes a listingHash from the whitelist and transfers tokens back to owner
@param _listingHash The listing hash to delete
nodes.name: resetListing

appWasMade(bytes32).details: Returns true if apply was called for this listingHash

params._listingHash: The listingHash whose status is to be examined

apply(bytes32,uint256,string,string).details: Allows a user to start an application. Takes tokens from user and sets apply stage end time.

params._amount: The number of ERC20 tokens a user is willing to potentially stake
params._data: Extra data relevant to the application. Think IPFS hashes.
params._listingHash: The hash of a potential listing a user is applying to add to the registry

canBeWhitelisted(bytes32).details: Determines whether the given listingHash be whitelisted.

params._listingHash: The listingHash whose status is to be examined

challenge(bytes32,string).details: Starts a poll for a listingHash which is either in the apply stage or already in the whitelist. Tokens are taken from the challenger and the applicant's deposits are locked.

params._data: Extra data relevant to the challenge. Think IPFS hashes.
params._listingHash: The listingHash being challenged, whether listed or in application

challengeCanBeResolved(bytes32).details: Determines whether voting has concluded in a challenge for a given listingHash. Throws if no challenge exists.

params._listingHash: A listingHash with an unresolved challenge

challengeExists(bytes32).details: Returns true if the application/listingHash has an unresolved challenge

params._listingHash: The listingHash whose status is to be examined

claimReward(uint256,uint256).details: Called by a voter to claim their reward for each completed vote. Someone must call updateStatus() before this can be called.

params._challengeID: The PLCR pollID of the challenge a reward is being claimed for
params._salt: The salt of a voter's commit hash in the given poll

claimRewards(uint256[],uint256[]).details: Called by a voter to claim their rewards for each completed vote. Someone must call updateStatus() before this can be called.

params._challengeIDs: The PLCR pollIDs of the challenges rewards are being claimed for
params._salts: The salts of a voter's commit hashes in the given polls

deposit(bytes32,uint256).details: Allows the owner of a listingHash to increase their unstaked deposit.

params._amount: The number of ERC20 tokens to increase a user's unstaked deposit
params._listingHash: A listingHash msg.sender is the owner of

determineReward(uint256).details: Determines the number of tokens awarded to the winning party in a challenge.

params._challengeID: The challengeID to determine a reward for

exit(bytes32).details: Allows the owner of a listingHash to remove the listingHash from the whitelist Returns all tokens to the owner of the listingHash

params._listingHash: A listingHash msg.sender is the owner of.

init(address,address,address,string).details: Initializer. Can only be called once.

params._token: The address where the ERC20 token contract is deployed

isWhitelisted(bytes32).details: Returns true if the provided listingHash is whitelisted

params._listingHash: The listingHash whose status is to be examined

params._voter: The voter whose claim status to query for the provided challengeID

updateStatus(bytes32).details: Updates a listingHash's status from 'application' to 'listing' or resolves a challenge if one exists.

params._listingHash: The listingHash whose status is being updated

updateStatuses(bytes32[]).details: Updates an array of listingHashes' status from 'application' to 'listing' or resolves a challenge if one exists.

params._listingHashes: The listingHashes whose status are being updated

voterReward(address,uint256,uint256).details: Calculates the provided voter's token reward for the given poll.

params._challengeID: The pollID of the challenge a reward balance is being queried for
params._salt: The salt of the voter's commit hash in the given poll
params._voter: The address of the voter whose reward balance is to be returned

voterReward(address,uint256,uint256).return: The uint indicating the voter's reward

withdraw(bytes32,uint256).details: Allows the owner of a listingHash to decrease their unstaked deposit.

params._amount: The number of ERC20 tokens to withdraw from the unstaked deposit.
params._listingHash: A listingHash msg.sender is the owner of.
